adverbs.description: gushingly (comparative more gushingly, superlative most gushingly)

entries.meaning: So as to gush or flow forth.
examples: Just send a good, strong current through, so that the water overflows gushingly, and shake the reels from time to time  […]

entries.meaning: In a gushing manner; with overeffusive sentimentality.
examples: "We went to see Guys and Dolls in New York," Maria Clara said gushingly. "It was so typical. We thought of you."
